description:
cmd/ld, runtime/cgo: allow a symbol to be both cgo_export and cgo_import.
Fixes issue 4878.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/7420052/diff/5001/src/cmd/ld/go.c
File src/cmd/ld/go.c (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7420052/diff/5001/src/cmd/ld/go.c#newcode501
src/cmd/ld/go.c:501: // export overrides import
// export overrides import, for openbsd/cgo.
// see issue 4878.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1da9617aaae9 ***

cmd/ld, runtime/cgo: allow a symbol to be both cgo_export and cgo_import.
Fixes issue 4878.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
